body: Thanks to @AtomJoJo and @naniiiii for pointing out the live adaptation. One thing I found funny about it: out of all male pornstars in Japan, they couldn't find any as buff, tall, or hung as the guys in this manga, which made the whole premise nearly nonsensical in comparison.

@Hold My Beer Kiddies It is true that they did not force her to drink with them. But the plot ceases to be credible because of that stupid blackmail of deleting a photo (which does not prove infidelity) in exchange for a blowjob. It is stupid to blackmail a person with such a simple photo. She is not even a whore to believe that is why she would accept such a deal. Then there is the convenience of alcohol (more fiction than real). Alcohol only serves in the story as a plot driver (making the wife horny) BUT the problem: she ends up enduring long hours of hard, uninterrupted sex. Anyone knows that alcohol, although it is a disinhibitor, in the long term ends up exhausting you. So the long hours of rough sex are nothing more than fiction. If you're inexperienced in rough sex, you're pretty much out of the game in a couple of hours. Therefore, the part of rough sex is nothing more than fiction so that the impregnation scene appears and she screams that they impregnate her. LOL

Hot as fuck. But i gotta disagree with alot of people, the husband literally did nothing wrong and the wife is in the wrong for being mad at him. People keep saying its the husbands fault for choosing work over his wife. I mean if he doesnt work with what money are they supposed to live off of?? they would be broke. I would understand if both wife and husband both had a job and the husband was overworking but here he literally has to work to provide for the family since the wife doesn't.
What's the title for part 2

What I like about this story is that it's believable. At a moment when she's vulnerable, lonely and pissed with her husband....and then gets even MORE pissed at her husband, she stumbles across these two guys, and of her own will falls to them. They didn't drug her, they didn't make her come to their room. Now, they're pushy guys, but they were cool with playing with her and the kid all day. They had no idea they were staying at the same inn,  and then senpai gives her their room number inviting her for drinks.  This is so much better than drugging and rape BS. These guys were hitting on  her, but like IRL, they were hoping for something, got lucky and then when they got pushy, she gave in...quickly. She'd been without sex for a while, the guys are buff, and she'd started playing with herself in the onsen, but got interrupted. She was raring to go, let loose had amazing sex. The vids? She remembers how she was & wants more.  It's believable & erotic as hell.

I got a little teary eye after reading this. While reading i bust a nut and decided to continue reading; the post nut clarity was awful. The fear or rather dread of being cheated slap across my mind as read, "i really can be cheated on at anytime", then why did i jizzed so hard in this one? The speak to NTR is not the dread of the heartbreak of seeing someone get raped or being cheated on but rather the list during the cheating and raping. Despite knowing full well it's appeal and being fiction, i still can't shake the dread or rather sudden fear of being cheated on and the disappointment of lusting off of it.  I can't help wanting to cry but I can't. Dread is lingering in my mind even hours later and while writing this. There is no point to this beyond venting my dread, but thanks for reading.

@Nudeclear it's really not the best genre. If it is, it should be consistent across most, if not all of the works regarding the genre. Netorare pales in comparison to say the tomboy genre to the percentage of works that are truly appreciated by the general public out of the more prominent ones, with the ntr most popular doujins having a cesspool of incels and cucks in the comments. I'm not gonna be a pussy and say ntr is hellspawn and we should get rid of it because there really are some good ones like here but the amount of shitty ntr doujins is so much, it's hard to enjoy. I guess you could factor in that ntr is a bigger tag than tomboy meaning more shitty works in pure numbers but the point still stands.

@SchrodingerZ There are crazy stories out there that can be possible and has happened. Marking something as fictitious and untrue because it hasn't happened to you is utterly asinine. I get that people can have their own kinks and fetishes. Fetishes aren't really something you can explain, but don't you call someone else's life bullshit.
